website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for men who want a unique cufflink style, but may not appeal to those who like classic looks.
pros: Stand out for their ornate design with durable rhodium finish
Quality construction and expensive look at an affordable price point
cons: Some men who wore them noted that they were someone bulky and heavy compared to other cufflink styles

customer_reviews.title: not satisfied with your product
customer_reviews.text: not satisfied with your product, just when pickup the product and try it was broken in my hand . its bad experience, and I am not pleased to do business with you again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first attempted wear
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, heavy weight, clean metal work. But the first time my husband tried to use them, one broke. The other one doesn't seem so fragile, but one is not useful, I seem to be past the point of return (purchased late October... should be able to return, I think), and can't find specific link to contact the seller. If I can return or exchange, would be very grateful.
customer_reviews.author: JamareeS

customer_reviews.title: Great cuff links
customer_reviews.text: I have a bunch of cuff links. In fact I'm slightly addicted to them and these ones just add to that addiction. They're understated, have a nice size and weight to them. They fit the shirt well and have little to no movement. Of course, the pattern is going to personal preference (of course, I like the design otherwise I wouldn't have purchased them) but the craftsmanship of creating the design is very well done. The fit and finish simply couldn't be better. These a great cuff links.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Craig

customer_reviews.title: DON'T PURCHASE!  Like other shoppers BROKEN BEFORE I EVEN WORE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: There are terrible junk. I regret purchasing them and I regret not returning them to get my money back even more. Bought these to wear to an out-of-town wedding. Like the experiences other purchasers endured, these broke off at the base BEFORE I EVEN GOT THEM ON. So because they were useless, I forgot them at the house where i readied myself for the wedding. By the time I got reunited with them, the return window for getting my money back had closed. Don't risk it, especially if you don't have a cuff link backup plan!
customer_reviews.author: McF Clan

customer_reviews.title: Good look, but hard to insert.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the product and the heft, but the designof the link is clumsy and difficult to insert through the french cuff. I would not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product .... Poor experience
customer_reviews.text: Poorly Constructed, broke clasp second time they were worn. Company MeMeDy very polite in correspondence, however difficult to deal with and did not stand behind the defective product. Guess I will just wear the one that still works.
customer_reviews.author: SMc

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Glorious and elegant came very quickly and came very well taken care of wonderful packaging and a wonderful gift no problems with clasp no fade
customer_reviews.author: Devon Argo

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, feels heavy (maybe a bit too heavy for cufflinks) which makes you think these are quality made, but they're not. Wore them once and they broke that same day.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Sharp cufflinks
customer_reviews.text: These are great cufflinks. Despite some of the lower ratings noted, I have had no problems with the post coming undone. In fact, the post on the pair I have appear very sturdy. These go great with a Kofi style prayer cap I have with a similar design of the cufflinks. Sharp...very sharp!!
customer_reviews.author: D.T.

customer_reviews.title: These look incredibly nice and are quite heavy
customer_reviews.text: These look incredibly nice and are quite heavy. Definitely attract a little attention to your cuffs but not so much that you look like a turd. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jon B

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They add just a subtle Gaelic accent that most people will only notice when they get close to you, but the size and shape does draw people's eye to them. They are a little bigger than my other cufflinks, but I think the size is perfect. They also appear to be a higher quality than the price suggests. If I didn't know the price I would've guessed them to be in the $50 range.
customer_reviews.author: Bdub

customer_reviews.title: Nice but large
customer_reviews.text: They are heavy, sturdy, well made, and I've received a number of compliments on them. However, they are the largest cufflinks I own. They are not tacky, but aren't subtle either. The curved stud makes taking them on and off a bit tricky with your off hand. But, given the quality I wouldn't reduce my rating because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Silenus

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice.
customer_reviews.text: These far exceeded my expectations. They are heavy and well made. They look sharp--my son has already confiscated them for use for himself! I was skeptical because they were so much cheaper than the sterling silver ones, but am not disappointed at all.
customer_reviews.author: R Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy cuff links. Look good but just know they add weight to your cuffs.
customer_reviews.author: MWG2

customer_reviews.title: Cuff Links for Life!
customer_reviews.text: I have recently began building a preference for french cuff shirts and hence these are my second pair of cuff links. I really like them, a bit heavier than my other set but the design stands out and the quality of the product shows. I have gotten several compliments about the shirt style and once they take a look at the cuff links the praises only get better. I feel like these are the kind of cuff links I can pass down to my son.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality cuff links
customer_reviews.text: These were great cuff links. I been wearing them all day and they stayed in place, look great and have a decent size to show off the ornate decoration. The only down size is they are a little heavy due to their thickness and many people might not be used to having real cuff links on and the extra weight they have. Overall though, I really like this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Kind of heavy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cufflinks but they're kind of heavy. Otherwise fine and they are very handsome.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised with the quality
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a gift. The person I got them for was very impressed. I had second thoughts about keeping them for myself. The look and weight make them appear very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality with intricate detailing1
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband and he loves them! They are a heavier weight than his other cuff links, which he likes. Great quality product with intricate detailing. Beautiful... yet manly ;-) & unique. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: I gave these as a gift & they were quite ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a gift & they were quite impressed with not only the quality, but the weight, they're quite heavy. Absolutely ♡ these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Worth its money
customer_reviews.text: It is not luxury but it worth its price and more. Not sure I would buy it as a gift but for myself I am quite happy with it. Looks like at the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Borlev

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cufflinks!
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice, well made, heavy and good looking cufflinks. They are a great buy for the price. I haven't had any problems with the workmanship, quality or function. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Knutester

customer_reviews.title: which is fantastic. They have some weight to them too
customer_reviews.text: They looked exactly as pictured, which is fantastic. They have some weight to them too, so they don't feel or look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: AMV

customer_reviews.title: FRAGILE.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and weighty ... but third time I went to wear them I dropped them on the CARPETED floor and the shaft broke off of the head. Cheap, brittle base metal.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Dennis Lahti

customer_reviews.title: Great cuff links
customer_reviews.text: High quality! The posts are angled which makes them easier to put on. Stylish without being flashy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Davidson

customer_reviews.title: looked great until it broke while i was at a restaurant
customer_reviews.text: looked great until it broke while i was at a restaurant. Didn't bang it or anything, the top just fell off

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Elegant, But Heavy Cufflinks
customer_reviews.text: These are super beautiful and elegant and nice quality on which I've received nice compliments. However, they are a bit heavy.

customer_reviews.title: Bad

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Not uniformed production, the design fails on one of the cufflinks so they don't match. Good weight though..

customer_reviews.title: like silver. they look more like pewter
customer_reviews.text: the picture makes them shinier, like silver. they look more like pewter. they are for my husband on father's day.

customer_reviews.title: Larger than viewed
customer_reviews.text: One pair was okay and the other pair broke off at part to go thru shirt hope on cuff... very disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband's birthday. They are really sharp looking and he loves them. They are a heavier weight but that does not bother him.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: high quality and looks much better than pictures i recommend strongly its one of the ...
customer_reviews.text: high quality and looks much better than pictures i recommend strongly its one of the best cuff ling i have

customer_reviews.title: These cuff links arrived broken. They are only shipped/packaged ...
customer_reviews.text: These cuff links arrived broken. They are only shipped/packaged in a plastic bag from the manufacturer. I believe they are comprised of multiple pieces of metal resulting in breakage at where they are connected. BOTH of my cuff links were broken.
customer_reviews.author: Giangvann

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: For the price, they feel heavy and the workmanship is just beautiful. I got a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Raul E. Marques

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful. Arrived perfect and can appreciate the weight of these cufflinks. I am sure the bf will love them as well.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An unusual design which was a good addition to my husband's large cufflink collection

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these cuff links
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these cuff links. They are very heavy and rich looking. Great purchase at a very affordable price!

customer_reviews.title: Good, but larger than they look in the ad
customer_reviews.text: The picture make them look smaller than they really are. However, that is not a obstacle to wear then, in my case.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Love it, even though the pictures shows a much darker black background on the designed. the actual cufflinks looks are pretty much all metal.

customer_reviews.title: Bling for guys who usually don't do bling

customer_reviews.title: WOW!! Great Addition to my Collection.!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow that is the best I could give as an expression what I had when I saw them. I have had few cuff links these are really a great addition to my collection.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: I don't normally write reviews, but WOW! I ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews, but WOW! I was very hesitant when I ordering these cuff links. I purchased them as a gift for my father. They came in today and I am thoroughly impressed. I'm ordering a second pair for myself when I finish this review! Thank you MOWOM!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cuff links. Heavier and better quality than I expected. He has received many compliments on them.

customer_reviews.title: Another good value, but you must like the style. sd
customer_reviews.text: This really looks much better than I thought. No color but I knew it before I purchased them.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Recommend this cufflink because it is nice and heavy plus look very nice.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: They were huge, heavy, and broke as soon as we took them out of the package.

customer_reviews.title: Elegant  and nice
customer_reviews.text: Great product, elegant. Looks and feels much more than actual cost.
customer_reviews.author: Bashar Sinno

customer_reviews.title: These cuff links are wonderful! They exceeded my expectations by a long shot.
customer_reviews.text: These cuff links are wonderful! They exceeded my expectations by a long shot. I bought these because of the intricate "iron work" look, but I was nervous to purchase because they were so inexpensive. When I got them in the mail I was shocked by how heavy and sturdy they felt. My fiance was very happy with them. Although we don't think they were made conventionally, they are definitely sturdy and elegant. We are very happy with them! I'd suggest to anyone looking for beautiful cuff links, but on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Jourdan

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: These are by far my favorite! Substantial weight, classy and overall A MUST HAVE ! My husband LOVES these! Looks and feels like they cost $$$.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cufflinks!
customer_reviews.text: These cufflinks have great weight to them. Solid and sturdy but not too heavy! They came quickly and nicely packaged in a black velvet jewelry bag.

customer_reviews.title: Way better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They have become one of my favorite pairs to wear. I would by more products by this make just based on these cuff links.

product_meta.title: MOWOM Silver Tone Black 2PCS Rhodium Plated Cufflinks Celtic Cross Shirt Wedding Business

feature_bullets: ❤ METAL: Made of healthy brass, celtic cross design and good weight, durable and solid, strict quality control ensure it doesn't rust or cause Irritation.
❤ ADVANTAGE: The cufflink adopt flexible back closure & swiveling post, easier to bend, high polished surface and rounded edge, comfortable touch feeling, convenient to wear, long time to use.
❤ OCCASION: Perfect for wedding, working, party, dating, meeting and all kinds of formal occasions, show your professional and confidence.
❤ BEST GIFT: Including a black velvet bag with MOWOM on it. Good ideal gifts to yourself or share with your family, friends or lover.
❤ 90 DAYS MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: If for any reason our product doesn't meet your standards, just contact us for a free replacement or a full refund! The choice will be yours!
